title: To put it simply, title is what other users will see from any searches. Be sure to put an attractive one to increase your chance of hiring!
description: Be truthful and honest, describe what you can provide in details so other users can understand you better!
price: Pricing is only available in 'per hour' manner now. Don't worry! Be sure to expect more pricing method in the next upgrades!
photos: Add up to 3 pictures to showcase your skill/service. No obscene pictures please!
postal code: You will only need to key in once, be sure to put in the right postal code, so other users can find you more easily. We will only take your postal code for our listing and discovery features. Dont worry lah~
day availability: Select the days you are most likely to be free for a gig!
time availability: Select the time of the day you are most likely be free for a gig!
verification: We will verify your identity card with your postal code, upon successfully verfication you will be listed above everyone else! MORE GIGS LOH!!
